text: ql -ayha alrswl- lhwla' almshrkyn: hal min shurakayikum man yrshd 'iilaa altariq almstqym? fa'iinahum laa yaqdirun ealaa dhlk, qul lhm: allah wahdah yahdi aldal ean alhudaa 'iilaa alhq. ayhma 'ahaqu balatbae: man yahdi wahdah lilhaqi 'am man laa yahtadi ledm ealamah wldlalh, wahi shurakawukum alty la tahdy wala tahtdy 'iilaa 'an tuhdaa? fama balkm kayf swwaytm bayn allah wkhlqh? whdha hakam batl
